payload.title: Implement gh CLI integration in task-manager.ts
Implement gh CLI Integration for Tasks
payload.summary: Successfully integrated GitHub CLI with task-manager. Added 3 new commands: gh:issue (creates GitHub issues from tasks), gh:branch (creates git branches with naming convention task/<priority>/<id>-<slug>), gh:sync (syncs task status with GitHub - closes issues when task completed). Also added view command to show task details including GitHub info. Tested successfully: created issue #1 on GitHub and branch task/high/3_oml3k5-test-gh-cli-integration. Files modified: tools/shared/types.ts (4 insertions), tools/task-manager.ts (427 insertions).

Fix Bun.spawn stdio bug in plugin respawn
payload.description: The orchestrator respawn in `.opencode/plugin/index.ts` fails with "stdio must be an array". Need to fix lines 1220-1225 to use proper Bun.spawn options. Either use `stdio: ["ignore", "ignore", "ignore"]` or find correct way to redirect to file.

Harden orchestrator startup and watchdog behavior for single-leader model
payload.description: After the orchestrator leader election and stale-agent cleanup implementation (task_1767422728098_488s1n) lands, refine orchestrator startup and watchdog behavior so that new processes prefer reusing an existing healthy leader instead of spawning parallel orchestrators. Implement self-shutdown or idle behavior for non-leader orchestrators that start when a healthy leader lease exists, and tighten stale-orchestrator cleanup to minimize multi-leader windows, following Session 189 follow-up recommendation #4 in memory/working.md.

payload.title: Re-run leader election validation after implementation and CLI integration
payload.description: Once the single-leader orchestrator model is implemented (task_1767422728098_488s1n) and leader state is surfaced in CLI/monitoring (task_1767423270940_xmgxle), perform a second end-to-end validation of leader election and stale-orchestrator cleanup as described in Session 189. Confirm only one orchestrator holds the leader lease at a time, non-leaders self-demote or exit, and CLI/monitoring views accurately reflect leader id/epoch and cleanup events. Document findings in memory/working.md and update task quality assessments if needed.

payload.title: Improve prompts based on Anthropic prompting guides
payload.description:
User request: Improve prompts for agents, tools, etc based on Anthropic blog guides.

Key Anthropic Guidance Found:
1. "Building Effective Agents" - Key principles: simplicity, transparency, well-documented tool interfaces
2. "Long Context Prompting" - Use scratchpad for quotes, contextual examples improve recall
3. "Claude 2.1 Prompting" - Add "Here is the most relevant sentence" to guide extraction (27% to 98% accuracy)
4. "Prompt Caching" - Structure prompts for cache efficiency

Prompts to Improve:
- Orchestrator prompt (tools/generate-orchestrator-prompt.ts)
- Worker prompt (tools/generate-worker-prompt.ts)
- Plugin system prompt injection (.opencode/plugin/index.ts)
- Tool definitions (.opencode/plugin/tools/*.ts)
- Agent skills (.opencode/skill/*.md)

Focus Areas per Anthropic:
1. Maintain simplicity in agent design
2. Prioritize transparency by showing planning steps
3. Craft agent-computer interface (ACI) through thorough tool documentation
4. Use routing for different task types
5. Evaluator-optimizer pattern for iterative refinement
6. Proper tool documentation with examples and edge cases

payload.title: Improve prompts based on Anthropic prompting guides

payload.reason: Leader agent-1767432247589-hhlnve (epoch 2) is active with valid lease. Exiting to prevent multi-orchestrator conflict.

payload.title: Improve prompts based on Anthropic prompting guides

payload.summary: Applied Anthropic prompt engineering best practices across agent prompts, tool descriptions, and skills. Key improvements: added scratchpad/thinking patterns for better decision-making, restructured prompts with context at start and instructions at end (per Anthropic long context guidance), enhanced all tool descriptions with usage examples and edge cases, updated all 4 skill files with clearer workflows and tables.
recommendations: Consider running the improved prompts through a test cycle to validate they parse correctly
Future improvement: add more contextual examples in tool descriptions based on actual usage patterns

payload.summary: CLI Audit complete. Fixed quality score display bug: quality-assessments.json uses 'aggregate_stats' with 'avg_overall_score' but code expected 'summary' with 'average_score'. Updated getQualityStore() in tools/shared/data-fetchers.ts to normalize both formats. Also updated cli.ts, realtime-monitor.ts, and _wip_ui/terminal-dashboard/data.ts to use the shared function. Quality now displays correctly as 8.2/10 instead of 'N/A'. All tested and working: 'bun tools/cli.ts status', 'bun tools/cli.ts quality', 'bun tools/cli.ts agents', 'bun tools/cli.ts tasks', 'bun tools/realtime-monitor.ts'. No other data loading issues found.

Integrated leader election state into CLI dashboard/monitor. Added LeaderState and LeaderInfo types to shared/types.ts, getLeaderInfo() helper to shared/data-fetchers.ts. Updated tools/cli.ts showAgents() to display leader status section and [LEADER] tag on agents. Updated tools/realtime-monitor.ts with renderLeaderSection(), leader info in status bar (Leader: E8), and [L] tag on leader agent. Added orchestrator-state.json to file watchers. Handles missing orchestrator-state.json gracefully with defaults.
